mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_work ( WORK_NO, EMP_NO, WORK_TYPE_CODE, WORK_DAY, WORK_START_TIME, WORK_END_TIME, WORK_PERMIT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFIER, MODIFIER_DATE, USE_YN, WORK_ATTENDANCE ) SELECT work_no_seq.NEXTVAL, e.EMP_NO, 'Y', SYSDATE, null, null, 'Y', SYSDATE, '0000', --시스템 번호 SYSDATE, 'Y', 'N' FROM tbl_employee e where e.use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.select: select * from tbl_work where emp_no = #{empNo} and TRUNC(WORK_DAY) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.update: update tbl_work set work_start_time = to_char(sysdate, 'HH24:MI:SS') where emp_no = #{empNo} and trunc(work_day) = trunc(sysdate)

UPDATE TBL_WORK SET WORK_END_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') , WORK_ATTENDANCE = CASE WHEN ((TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(WORK_START_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) < 4 THEN 'N' WHEN ((TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(WORK_START_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) >= 4 AND ((TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(WORK_START_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) < 9 THEN 'J' WHEN TO_DATE(WORK_START_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS') <= TO_DATE('09:00:00', 'HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') >= TO_DATE('18:00:00', 'HH24:MI:SS') THEN 'O' WHEN sysdate > to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD') || ' 09:00:00', 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND WORK_END_TIME IS NOT NULL then 'L' ELSE 'N' END WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND TRUNC(WORK_DAY) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
